original_text: “Consecrate those parts of the ordination ram that belong to Aaron and his sons: the breast that was waved and the thigh that was presented.
korean_text: 너는 그 흔든 요제물 곧 아론과 그의 아들들의 위임식 숫양의 가슴과 넓적다리를 거룩하게 하라

sentences.original_text: Consecrate those parts of the ordination ram
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위임식 숫양의 부분들을 거룩하게 구별하라

sentences.original_text: that belong to Aaron and his sons
and the thigh that was presented
